title: Can't purchase rp
body: Whenever I open the "purchase rp" tab it all works fine, I can click how I want to pay and what I want but I can't type anything, I can't type the cvv of my card or my paypal info, it just won't appear at all, my keyboard is working and this is happening to 2 of my other friends as well, what's going on?

replies.body:
Ah, this is an issue we're aware of, as mentioned on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na):

> **Network Operations – 6:30 AM**
We're aware of an issue with RP purchasing and are working on a fix. To purchase RP, please use the legacy client.

Just swap over to the **Legacy Client** from the [_login screen_](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg) and you should be able to snag that RP with no further issues, friend! If you need help with anything else, just poke me. 

o｜◕ˇ▽ˇ◕｜ツ
